articles.title: Adopt a healthy diet on World No Tobacco Day 2022
articles.description: Quitting smoking is not easy but extremely necessary. Smoking causes several life-threatening diseases, including cancer and heart failure. Smokers also need to have a healthy diet to minimise the adverse impact of smoking on their bodies.
articles.content:
The world celebrates May 31 as World No Tobacco Day. The celebration aims to spread awareness regarding the ill effects of smoking and convince people to quit smoking and adopt a healthy lifestyle.
